mapper.select: select ii.INST_ID, ii.NAME, ii.EMAIL, ii.INTRODUCTION, ii.IMAGE, ii.PHONE, ii.MAJOR_SUBJECT, ii.EDUCATION ,i.DEL_YN from INST_INFO ii, INSTRUCTOR i where (ii.INST_ID = i.INST_ID) and (i.DEL_YN ='N')
select ii.INST_ID, ii.NAME from INST_INFO ii, INSTRUCTOR i where (ii.INST_ID = i.INST_ID) and (i.DEL_YN ='Y')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INST_INFO (INST_ID, NAME, EMAIL, INTRODUCTION, IMAGE,PHONE,EDUCATION,MAJOR_SUBJECT) VALUES (#{inst_id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{introduction}, #{image},#{phone},#{education},#{major_subject})
